title: AI Based Child Safety System
description: An intelligent system designed with Python, OpenCV, Arduino UNO R3, RFID, and an LCD screen for automated child check-in and check-out at schools and daycare centers.

title: FarmBot: Smart Agriculture System
description: A chatBot to help the farmers with there crop related queries and to provide them with the best possible solutions.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Interactive weather dashboard displaying real-time weather data with forecasts and beautiful visualizations.

title: Bluethooth Controlled Car
description: A car that can be controlled using a mobile app via Bluetooth technology.
